Message:
My lord, when we met
at the end of my travels,
it all became clear to me.

That you—the one
who accepted me—
are whom I am to serve.

And I knew that
if you acknowledged me,
I could surely sever ties
with my past self.

From the day I was born,
I was but a blade
without a master.

Yet, you provided me
with what I had been
searching for this whole time.

A reason to fight,
a home, as well as...
acknowledgement...praise...
and a place by your side...

From this point on,
I will grow even stronger,
and it will all be for you.

I shall become the blade
that cleaves every obstacle
in your path...

You have my word—
your kindness will be repaid.
